tmuxr 0.1.0.9000
  • Home
  • Reference

Reference

Sessions

attach_session()

Attach to an existing tmux session.

kill_session()

Kill a session.

list_sessions()

List sessions.

new_session()

Create a new tmux session.

rename_session()

Rename a session.

Windows

attach_window()

Attach to an existing tmux window.

list_windows()

List windows.

Panes

attach_pane()

Attach to an existing tmux pane.

capture_pane()

Capture contents of a pane.

list_panes()

List panes.

pipe_pane()

Pipe contents of a pane to a shell command.

Server

is_installed()

Is tmux correctly installed?

is_running()

Is the tmux server running?

kill_server()

Kill the tmux server.

start_server()

Start the tmux server.

Interacting

ends_with_prompt()

Does the contents of a pane end with prompt?

get_prompt()

Get the prompt pattern of a session, window or pane.

has_prompt()

Is there a prompt pattern associated with a session, window, or pane?

prompts

A list of commonly used prompt patterns.

send_backspace()

Send the Backspace key to a session, window or pane.

send_control_c()

Send the Control C combination to a session, window or pane.

send_enter()

Send the Enter key to a session, window or pane.

send_keys()

Send keys to a session, window, or pane.

send_lines()

Send multiple lines to a session, window, or pane.

set_prompt()

Set the prompt pattern of a session, window or pane.

wait()

Wait.

wait_for_prompt()

Wait for prompt to appear in session, window or pane.

  • Sessions
  • Windows
  • Panes

  • Interacting
